publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Young for John Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard neere St. Austins gate,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacking signatures A1-2; beginning - sig. B1 from Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy, spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard neere St. Austins gate
